name: Bird Place!
description:
It's Bird Place! A VR pet simulator! Spend some quality time with some cute birds in a comforting bedroom!

FEATURES

  • Pick up birds
  • Stack birds
  • Feed birds
  • Throw birds
  • Pet birds

If your birds are out of reach, call them back with the Magic Phone!

SPECIAL THANKS

Penny Evans - Parenting Sim Consultant

Dustin Freeman - VR Development Consultant

ASSETS USED

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/cute-bird-139617
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/anime-rooms-75722
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/plates-bowls-mugs-pack-146682

Music is Meditation Impromptu 03 by Kevin MacLeod

Chirping sound effect is Cartoon Birds 2 recorded by Daniel Simion

---

Bird Place will only run properly on the Oculus Rift on Windows and Mac.

NOTE: I don't own a Mac so I don't know if the Mac build works at all.
